text: The women's 100 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 16 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Lauryn Williams ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Simone Facey ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Marshevet Hooker ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July Wind: -0.2m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
